sentence.Network_en: Jadeite jade consists of minerals of pyroxene, amphibole and feldspar groups.

sentence.Network_en: Industry: petroleum, diamonds, iron ore, phosphates, feldspar, bauxite, uranium, gold.

sentence.Network_en: Feldspar commonly used are: granite a long stone set fire to rocks.
sentence.Network_cn: 常用的长石主要有: 花岗岩、霞硌、正长石等火烧岩.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: alteration of German Feldspat, Feldspath, from Feld 'field' + Spat, Spath 'spar' (see spar). The form felspar is by mistaken association with German Fels 'rock'

means.word_mean: 1. any of a group of hard crystalline minerals that consist of aluminum silicates of potassium or sodium or calcium or barium
